title: [Health] Study: E-cigarette use linked to smoking cessation among smokers not planning to quit. Among smokers who never had plans to quit, those who used e-cigarettes daily were eight times more likely to stop smoking cigarettes than those who did not use e-cigarettes.

[Medicine] Hip and knee replacements, surgery for carpal tunnel syndrome and other orthopedic procedures are among the most common elective surgeries performed today. New research finds that for many common problems of the knee, hip, shoulder, spine and wrist, nonsurgical options may be just as good.
